comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Pedro José Domingo de la Calzada Manuel María Lascuráin Paredes (born May 8, 1856 in Mexico City; died July 21, 1952 in Mexico City) was both Mexico's and the world's briefest-ever serving president.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
trialsanderrors:

What an impressive name! We will add this information to the record. Thank you!

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
After Madero´s murder he took oath, and served only 45 minutes! A pharse done so Huerta could take office.
Dr. Roberto Duarte
